mapper.select: SELECT user_name FROM Auth_Info WHERE user_email =#{userEmail} AND user_password=#{userPassword}
SELECT user_email FROM Auth_Info WHERE user_email =#{userEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Auth_Info (USER_PASSWORD, USER_NAME, CREATED_AT, USER_EMAIL) values ( #{userPassword}, #{userName}, TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy/mm/DD hh24:mi:ss'), #{userEmail} )
INSERT INTO EMAIL_CERTIFICATION (TEMP_USER_EMAIL, SELFAUTH, CREATED_AT) values ( #{userEmail}, #{selfAuth}, TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy/mm/DD hh24:mi:ss') )

DELETE FROM EMAIL_CERTIFICATION WHERE TEMP_USER_EMAIL = ( SELECT TEMP_USER_EMAIL FROM (SELECT * FROM EMAIL_CERTIFICATION WHERE TEMP_USER_EMAIL=#{userEmail} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC) WHERE rownum <= 1 )
